articles.author: Prerna Lidhoo
articles.title: Why the Mahindra-SsangYong partnership didn’t work out
articles.description: Mahindra-owned SsangYong Motor is finally sold to South Korean electric bus and truck maker Edison Motors. But why did M&M’s much-hyped partnership fail?
articles.content: Debt-ridden SsangYong Motor is finally acquired by a local consortium led by South Korean electric bus and truck maker Edison Motors for 305 billion Won ($254.56 million). According to the companys r… [+3914 chars]
